p: The New Lodge.—Friendship No. 13 will be the name of the new Lodge of Odd Fewllos to be established at Port Gamble next Friday night. The organizing officer will be Mr. H. G. Struve of Olympia, from which place and this numerous delegations of the brethren will go on the Messenger on Friday afternoon. The Lodge will commence its career with five charter and fifteen or eighteen initiate members. The Messenger will return with the party early on Saturday morning.
